```{r warning = F, error = F, message = F, echo = F}
library(RCurl)
fileName <- 'functionList.csv'
functionList <-
  read.csv(
    file = paste0('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/csv/',
                  fileName),
    header = F,
    as.is = T)
for(iii in 1:nrow(functionList)){
  script <- 
    getURL(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/", 
                  functionList[iii,1]),
           ssl.verifypeer = F)
  eval(parse(text = script))
}
```

# JODI Oil World Database → Joint Organisations Data Initiative - Primary (all data) → TIME → ×で全てのチェックを外す → Fromで期間指定 → Search → チェック → Show Table

  getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/importCrudeOilProduction.r",
         ssl.verifypeer = F)
eval(parse(text = script))

tDF <-
  fun_transposeDataFrame(obj = CrudeOilProduction,dateFormat = dateFormat,colName = 'Country',tailN = 6)
tDF <-
  tDF[order(tDF[,ncol(tDF)],decreasing = T),]
tDF[,-1] <-
  apply(tDF[,-1],2,round)
fun_markdownTable(obj = tDF)

***
#### 主要産油国の産油量時系列推移

```{r,warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
objColumn <-
  grep('russia|saudi|united states',colnames(CrudeOilProduction),ignore.case = T)
n <- 1
fun_generateKnit(objDF = CrudeOilProduction[,c(1,objColumn)],plotNum = n,group = 0,
                 dygraphTitle = paste0(colnames(CrudeOilProduction)[objColumn],collapse = '×'))
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n)))
```

***
#### 日本の産油量時系列推移

```{r,warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
objColumn <-
  grep('japan',colnames(CrudeOilProduction),ignore.case = T)
n <- 2
fun_generateKnit(objDF = CrudeOilProduction[,c(1,objColumn)],plotNum = n,group = 0,quantiles = 2,
                 dygraphTitle = colnames(CrudeOilProduction)[objColumn])
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n)))
```
